components.description:
A hyacinth with purple blossoms and a green stem.

Can be used to talk about the actual flower, flowers in general, or the color purple. Can also be used in reference to springtime. May be used as part of the symbolic table setting for Nowruz, the Persian New Year.

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

 

  • 📝 Unicode 15.0 details on Unicode.org
